channel.title: What Am I up to Right Meow? on sK
channel.description: Recent content in What Am I up to Right Meow? on sK

item.title: A Whole New Pile of Mess
item.description: You hear me, baby? Hold together! Got him! I got him! Great kid! Don’t get cocky. There are still two more of them out there! That’s it! We did it! We did it! Help! I think I’m melting! This is all your fault. There’s nothing you could have done, Luke, had you been there. You’d have been killed, too, and the droids would be in the hands of the Empire. I want to come with you to Alderaan.

item.title: New Podcast, New Work Schedule, Etc.
item.description: You hear me, baby? Hold together! Got him! I got him! Great kid! Don’t get cocky. There are still two more of them out there! That’s it! We did it! We did it! Help! I think I’m melting! This is all your fault. There’s nothing you could have done, Luke, had you been there. You’d have been killed, too, and the droids would be in the hands of the Empire. I want to come with you to Alderaan.

item.title: Recovering from the Wreckage of hues
item.description: Kid, I’ve flown from one side of this galaxy to the other. I’ve seen a lot of strange stuff, but I’ve never seen anything to make me believe there’s one all-powerful force controlling everything. There’s no mystical energy field that controls my destiny. It’s all a lot of simple tricks and nonsense. I suggest you try it again, Luke. This time, let go your conscious self and act on instinct. With the blast shield down, I can’t even see.
